inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('SpellFailure', 'Stackable', 5); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Proficient Casting
description: You have focused on the motions and sounds of spell casting. You gain a 5% bonus against spell failure on all spell casting attempts.  This stacks with bonuses from other sources such as Armor Casting.
